definitions: The action of securing a ship or boat with an anchor.
The action of providing a firm basis or support for something.
The action of fixing something firmly in position.
The action of basing something on a particular idea or principle.
examples: The crew was busy anchoring the vessel.
The architect was anchoring the new building to the bedrock.
The speaker was anchoring his argument in historical facts.
The artist was anchoring the sculpture to the pedestal.
